argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ordeleqon | |- ( Ord A <-> ( A e. On \/ A = On ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( G ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( G ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 4 | 3 | #P_tfrlem15 | |- ( A e. On -> ( A e. dom recs ( G ) <-> ( recs ( G ) |` A ) e. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_dmeqi | |- dom F = dom recs ( G ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( A e. dom F <-> A e. dom recs ( G ) ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_reseq1i | |- ( F |` A ) = ( recs ( G ) |` A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( ( F |` A ) e. _V <-> ( recs ( G ) |` A ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 4, 6, 8 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( A e. On -> ( A e. dom F <-> ( F |` A ) e. _V ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_onprc | |- -. On e. _V |
| 11 |  | #P_elex | |- ( On e. dom F -> On e. _V ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mto | |- -. On e. dom F |
| 13 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( A = On -> ( A e. dom F <-> On e. dom F ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_mtbiri | |- ( A = On -> -. A e. dom F ) |
| 15 | 3 | #P_tfrlem13 | |- -. recs ( G ) e. _V |
| 16 | 1 | #P_eleq1i | |- ( F e. _V <-> recs ( G ) e. _V ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_mtbir | |- -. F e. _V |
| 18 |  | #P_reseq2 | |- ( A = On -> ( F |` A ) = ( F |` On ) ) |
| 19 | 1 | #P_tfr1a | |- ( Fun F /\ Lim dom F ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_simpli | |- Fun F |
| 21 |  | #P_funrel | |- ( Fun F -> Rel F ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_ax-mp | |- Rel F |
| 23 | 19 | #P_simpri | |- Lim dom F |
| 24 |  | #P_limord | |- ( Lim dom F -> Ord dom F ) |
| 25 |  | #P_ordsson | |- ( Ord dom F -> dom F C_ On ) |
| 26 | 23, 24, 25 | #P_mp2b | |- dom F C_ On |
| 27 |  | #P_relssres | |- ( ( Rel F /\ dom F C_ On ) -> ( F |` On ) = F ) |
| 28 | 22, 26, 27 | #P_mp2an | |- ( F |` On ) = F |
| 29 | 18, 28 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( A = On -> ( F |` A ) = F ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( A = On -> ( ( F |` A ) e. _V <-> F e. _V ) ) |
| 31 | 17, 30 | #P_mtbiri | |- ( A = On -> -. ( F |` A ) e. _V ) |
